markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anointed Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1037)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 179 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The holy water generated by an anointed waterskin does not persist beyond the end of a session and has an effective sale price of 0 gp._

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This waterskin coruscates with holy energy, causing it to slowly fill itself with special blessed water unique to the item. After using any of the activations, the waterskin is empty, but slowly refills itself. It becomes full enough to use again at the next dawn.

<document level="2" id="action-826" />

<document level="2" id="action-827" />

<document level="2" id="action-828" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Anointed Waterskin
